Source code for schemas

from pydantic import BaseModel, Field
from typing import Optional
from datetime import datetime




[docs]
class HerdBase(BaseModel):
    species_name: str
    description: Optional[str] = None






[docs]
class HerdCreate(HerdBase):
    pass






[docs]
class Herd(HerdBase):
    id: int
    created_at: datetime
    updated_at: datetime



[docs]
    class Config:
        orm_mode = True








[docs]
class FamilyBase(BaseModel):
    friendly_name: str
    herd_id: int = Field(..., description="Must be a valid herd ID (integer)")






[docs]
class FamilyCreate(FamilyBase):
    pass






[docs]
class Family(FamilyBase):
    id: int
    created_at: datetime
    updated_at: datetime



[docs]
    class Config:
        orm_mode = True








[docs]
class EventCreate(BaseModel):
    description: str
    latitude: float
    longitude: float
    ts: Optional[datetime] = None
    metadata: Optional[str] = None






[docs]
class Event(EventCreate):
    id: int
    family_id: int
    ts: datetime
    description: str
    lat: float
    lng: float



[docs]
    class Config:
        orm_mode = True








[docs]
class ObservationCreate(BaseModel):
    latitude: float
    longitude: float
    size: int
    health_rating: int
    ts: Optional[datetime] = None






[docs]
class Observation(ObservationCreate):
    id: int
    family_id: int
    ts: datetime
    lat: float
    lng: float
    size: int
    health: int



[docs]
    class Config:
        orm_mode = True
